verses.esv: 19 But Mary treasured up all these things, pondering them in her heart.
verses.kjv: 19 But Mary kept all these things, and pondered them in her heart.
verses.niv: 19 But Mary treasured up all these things and pondered them in her heart.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv: 8 This Book of the Law shall not depart from your mouth, but you shall meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do according to all that is written in it. For then you will make your way prosperous, and then you will have good success.
verses.kjv: 8 This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success.
verses.niv: 8 Do not let this Book of the Law depart from your mouth; meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful.

verses.esv:
18   Open my eyes, that I may behold
    wondrous things out of your law.
verses.kjv: 18 Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
verses.niv: 18 Open my eyes that I may see wonderful things in your law.

verses.esv: 20 teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.‚Äù
verses.kjv: 20 Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.niv: 20 and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
